description: Very nice Gavel trail, nice view, nice lake
directions: Coming from Montréal or SherbrookeHighway 10 exit 68, Route 139, (boulevard David-Bouchard) or Highway 10 exit 74, Route 112, chemin OstiguyComing from Québec City :Take Highway 20 to exit 147, then Highway 116 to Acton Vale. Then follow Highway 139 in the direction of Granby until you get to the park.
title: Parc Yamaska
